workflow.name: Secure Email DLP Credit Card detected
workflow.title: Secure Email DLP Credit Card detected

properties.description:
This workflow monitors a mailbox for incoming email with DLP breach detected by Cisco Secure Email. When an email is received, the workflow increase the number of occurrence for a single internal user from 1 to 3. At each occurrence the internal user is informed of the detection. At the second occurrence, is manager is also informed. At the third occurrence, the internal user Azure account is disable. 

Target Group: Default TargetGroup 
Target Type : HTTP Endpoint, SMTP Endpoint

Targets: CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target, Azure_For_Access_Token,  Azure_Graph_API

For more information : aargeris@cisco.com
properties.display_name: Secure Email DLP Credit Card detected

actions.name: For Each
actions.title: Read from each email in attachment from the event

properties.display_name: Read from each email in attachment from the event

In case of a second attempt a email will be send to your manager $activity.definition_activity_01LYP7AL43HB50J0R9SLiAEfcQcc7X3hmwc.output.jsonpath_queries.displayName$
